review: Easy to set up and use. The remote was a little difficult to open to put the batteries in. Set up the app on my iPhone so I can also use my phone as a voice controlled remote.
author: Xinneelie "knitter"

review: Product worked fine for two weeks then product quit working.  The problem started by only downloading 25% of video then stopped.  This problem happened no matter what app I was using.  Finally, the apps quit loading all together.  My theory is the unit over heated because it is always on.  There is no off switch.  However, I am not an expert, so i could be wrong on why it quit working.If you buy this product you will risk product failure.  I had to send it back for a refund which Amazon did provide.
